show_name: Dr. Slump & Arale-chan Ncha! Penguin Mura wa Hare no chi Hare (movie)
other_title: Dr. Slump and Arale-chan: N-cha! Penguin Villiage is Swelling Then Fair
Dr. Slump e Arale - Il terribile mostro Dodongadon (Italian)
怪博士與機器娃娃 嗯加！企鵝村晴空萬里 (Chinese (Taiwan))
